trans-unit.source: Represents any <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> content intended to be displayed to an end user.
trans-unit.target: Representa qualquer conteúdo <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> que se destina a ser exibido para o usuário final.

trans-unit.source: Text content is HTML (with escaped markup), XHTML (valid XML, and is not escaped), or plain text.
trans-unit.target: Conteúdo de texto é HTML (com marcação com caracteres de escape), XHTML (XML válido e não tem escape), ou texto sem formatação.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: A instância <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent" /> com a instância <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: The text of the content.
trans-unit.target: O texto do conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent" /> with the specified text.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent" /> com o texto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to call this constructor.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como chamar este construtor.

trans-unit.source: The text of the content.
trans-unit.target: O texto do conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContentKind" /> that describes the content.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContentKind" /> que descreve o conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent" /> with the specified text and <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContentKind" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent" /> com o texto especificado e <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContentKind" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContentKind> parameter may be set to one of the following values:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContentKind> parâmetro pode ser definido como um dos valores a seguir:

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to call this constructor.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como chamar este construtor.

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of the existing <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia da instância de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent" /> existente.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o texto do <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent" />.

trans-unit.source: The text of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent" />.
trans-unit.target: O texto do <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the content type of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de conteúdo do <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the kind of Text Syndication Content.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa o tipo de conteúdo do texto de distribuição.

trans-unit.source: This property may have the following values:
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade pode ter os seguintes valores:

trans-unit.source: "text" for plain text content.
trans-unit.target: "texto" para o conteúdo de texto sem formatação.

trans-unit.source: "html" for HTML content.
trans-unit.target: "html" para o conteúdo HTML.

trans-unit.source: "xhtml" for XHTML content.
trans-unit.target: "xhtml" para o conteúdo XHTML.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> to write to.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> no qual ocorrerá a gravação.

trans-unit.source: Writes the contents of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent" /> to the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: Grava o conteúdo do <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent" /> no <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> especificado.
